articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Tata Steel Q4 net profit drops 84% to Rs 1,566 crore but beats estimates - Moneycontrol
articles.description: While profit dropped 84 percent, it managed to beat Street expectations. Brokerages had estimated a 91 percent drop at Rs 955 crore due to weak performance in the Europe business
articles.content: Tata Steel on May 2 reported an 84 percent year-on-year drop in its consolidated net profit at Rs 1,566 crore from the quarter ended March 2023. Net profit in the year-ago period stood at Rs 9,835 cr… [+2054 chars]
